body.name: Chicco KidFit Zip 2-in-1 Belt-Positioning Booster Car Seat, Eclipse
features: DuoZone combined head and shoulder side-impact protection with 10 positions for growing children

SuperCinch LATCH attachment with one-pull tightener helps keep KidFit in place and kid-ready for easy in/out. Highback Booster - Assembled Dimensions: 16.5 x 18.75 x 32.75 Inches. Backless Booster - Assembled Dimensions: 15 x 17 x 5 Inches
ErgoBoost double foam padding and contoured seat design provide support in all the right places
Zip&Wash extra, zip-off backrest pad and seat pad for easy cleaning, extended durability and fun, mix-and-match styling
2 space-saving cup holders fold away when not in use and are removable for easy cleaning
body.description: The #1-rated Chicco KeyFit 30 Zip Infant Car Seat is engineered with innovative features that make it the easiest infant car seat to install simply, accurately, and securely every time. It also features stylish zipper accents and a quick-remove seat pad for machine washing. The KeyFit 30 Zip's stay-in-car base has a ReclineSure leveling foot and two Ride Right bubble level-indicators to help achieve and verify proper angle in the vehicle seat. The base is also equipped with premium LATCH connectors and a Super Cinch tightener for a secure fit with a fraction of the effort. For alternate installation with the vehicle seat belt, clear belt routing and integrated lock-offs make it easy to position, tighten and lock the belt into place. A smooth underside helps protect vehicle seats from damage. To accommodate newborns, the car seat carrier includes removable head and body support with reversible knit/mesh fabrics for all-season comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a fantastic high back booster
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic high back booster. The material is great quality, there is plenty of padding on the seat and back rest. I love that it includes the latch system so the seat doesn't move around when my daughter gets in and out of the car. It is easy to assemble, easy to adjust and extremely easy to install in the car. I love that the liner zips off and is machine washable. It has great safety ratings, but is also quite light. We own britax boulevard and diono radian convertible seats which are awesome but heavy, so this is a nice change! I have not had any of the issues with the seatbelt coming out of the belt path or failing to tighten as some other reviewers have stated. For child size reference, my daughter is 5 yrs old, 43 lbs and 44 inches tall and this seat works perfectly for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buckle up in comfort.
reviews.reviewText: This checked all the boxes when searching for a booster seat:1. easy to remove covers for washing.2. Two cup holders/removable snack/storage bin.3. Convertible from high back to just lower booster4. Modern looks, comfortable, high safety standards.5. Wide weight rangeOur little guy loves this seat. Keeps him in a good seating position and the sides of the backrest fit great around the shoulder/head area. The bottom has a lot of cushioning and stays pretty cool. The latch system makes installation to the car very simple.Not sure why people say that their seatbelt won’t retract or falls out of the shoulder guide on the seat, but I have had zero issues with either. The belt stays put where it should.A cool feature that was a surprise to us is that they send you two different sets of armrest covers, in two different fabrics. This may come in really handy when something spills later down the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: After extensive research I decided on this option and I am glad I did. My 4 year old is switching from Recaro convertible, he is taller than average and was needing more shoulder and head height in back rest.This is my first ever Chicco, I am quite impressed.This seat hits every point for me, safety, comfort, easy to clean, easy to install, extras no charge, price point.Safery first, great shoulder and head support, not bulky at all. Super easy to install, very comfy only ride for the kid. I was looking for extra padded seat and this car seat has it and then some. Great for long rides.Fits perfect in my Pilot, my son get get in and out now with easeall by himself.Comes with some extras, witch we usually need to purchase separate, little bonus there already - storage tray and extra pair of arm rest covers. Price point $$$ out of $$$$$. My 1st pick would of been Recaro but it retails for $600, so this seat comes at fraction of the cost.I would highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the cup holder “cubby”- we have bought twice
reviews.reviewText: I bought this seat for my now 7 year old a few years ago. Just bought a second one for my now 5 year old.We have loved this seat! Comfortable, lightweight, super easy to install, and easy to remove the coverings for cleaning.But also, it comes with that awesome little cubby/box thing to sit in one of the cup holders. My boys LOVE that attachment. It gives them a great place to keep all their “treasures”, stash a few small toys, or hold their snacks. Chicco makes a great product in general, but that cup holder attachment is what won us over twice on this seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and safe.
reviews.reviewText: I checked reviews for safety and ease of use. This was a perfect fit for our 5 year old. It is lightweight and easy to click in place. She loves the cup holder and snack holder. Took a road trip and took a long nap. So it is comfortable for her to sit in for an extended drive. She is able to buckle her seatbelt and it stays in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2017
reviews.reviewText: A very nice booster seat. 1 star less because the side impact padding, by the ears, feels like it could be padded a little better. However, the seat and back are nicely padded. My daughter said it is very comfortable. She likes the little box (snack box) to hide stuff in. I like how even on the shortest setting, the shoulder belt is open and slides easily. I've tried using other seats that on the shortest setting, the seatbelt guide goes below the padded shoulder area and the seatbelt doesn't slide smoothly. I don't have a problem with this one. Also the cinch strap to hook it into the LATCH is so very easy to install. My daughter is 6 yrs old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, easy to install, comfy, secure.
reviews.reviewText: My son LOVES this car seat/booster! It’s easy to install and I love that it clips to the seat like a car seat would. We also bought the Chicco booster that doesn’t have the back but still has the clips for the seat for my husbands car. It also works great. My 4 year old (47lbs and very tall) is not usually in my husbands car more than once or twice a week for 5 minutes so that’s why we didn’t buy two of these. But I love all the chicco car seats and boosters we own. Solid product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good seat kids happy
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good seat , kid likes it , will grow with him ,easy enough to put together

Lo compré en una promoción y salió a muy buen precio, comparado con las opciones disponibles en las tiendas departamentales. En términos generales es un buen producto, seguro, muy fácil de instalar y limpiar. Mi niña tiene 3 años y se puede subir sin ningún problema ajustada con el cinturón de seguridad.
Es sencillo pero a mi hija le encanta, lo malo de cuando se duerme, aún le queda un poco grande
Muy buen producto, materiales de buena calidad, muy cómoda y segura para los niños. El único detalle es que tiene una cubierta en loa descansa brazos que no queda bien, se safa.
Llego a tiempo y dándole seguimiento Ben la app te da mucha más confianza, la calidad es excelente súper cómodo y seguro y estética de 10. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

Excelente producto y eso que investigué diferentes tipos de boosters y marcas. Precio-calidad adecuados. La pequeña usuaria de la silla la mas contenta. Lo recomiendo totalmente. Segura, cómoda y el respaldo se reclina.
